special_requirements: Desktop layout: 50-50vw flexbox split - image stays within its 50vw column (NOT breaking out to full viewport width)
Image takes full width of its 50vw container, stays within flexbox column
Maintain 800px frame height across ALL breakpoints (desktop, tablet, mobile)
Font sizes scale down gradually on smaller screens to prevent content overflow
Animations ONLY on desktop, triggered by scroll (not on page load)
NO animations on tablet or mobile devices
Mobile layout: image first, content below (NOT content first)
Mobile text alignment: content block is centered, but text is LEFT ALIGNED within that block
Colors are hardcoded (not editable in settings): background #FFFAF5, heading #183754, body #3E6282
Reuse existing logo SVG from custom-section-diamension-quote section
Rich text field for content (not separate paragraph fields)
